import sys
input = lambda : sys.stdin.readline()
int_arr = lambda : list(map(int, input().split()))
str_arr = lambda : list(map(str, input().split()))
get_str = lambda : map(str, input().split())
get_int = lambda : map(int, input().split())
get_flo = lambda : map(float, input().split())
mod = 1000000007

def solve(n, arr):
    mm = max(arr)
    if len(set(arr)) == 1:
        print(-1)
        return
    (x, y) = (-1, -1)
    for i in range(n):
        if arr[i] == mm and i != n - 1 and (arr[i + 1] < arr[i]):
            x = i + 1
            break
    for j in range(n - 1, -1, -1):
        if arr[j] == mm and j > 0 and (arr[j - 1] < arr[j]):
            y = j + 1
            break
    print(max(x, y))
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    arr = int_arr()
    solve(n, arr)
